USA: Second Anglo-Dutch War: The war began with the English conquest of New Amsterdam.
Taiwan: Qing commander Shi Lang leads a fleet of warships to invade Taiwan but is turned back by bad weather
Chinese population in Taiwan rises to 50,000
Chile: The Viceroalty of Peru estimates 30,000 to 42,000 Spaniards to have died in Chile of which half would have died by the direct consequences of the Arauco War.
